apps.name: Infuse
apps.subtitle: Smart video player with tweaked/modded subscription unlocked
apps.localizedDescription:
Tweaked/modded subscription unlocked!:33

Infuse is a powerful video player that lets you watch almost any video format on your iPhone or iPad. Stream from network shares, cloud services, or play files locally with beautiful design and advanced playback features.

versions.localizedDescription:
Tweaked/modded Infuse with Pro subscription unlocked!

NEW
- Ambient Mode displays glowing colors in the black bar areas
- Transliterate Simplified/Traditional Chinese text for search
- Added TMDB details page for deep linked TV series not present in Library

IMPROVED
- Improved handling of HDR subtitles

FIXED
- Fixed order of Emby watching list after a video is removed
- Many other minor fixes and improvements

Thanks so much for using Infuse! For full release details visit: firecore.com/releases

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: Please allow access in order to show iTunes videos.

privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: Used for streaming media to external devices
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Used for unlocking your device when restrictions are enabled
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Used to discover network shares and Google Cast devices in your local network
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Used for pairing with external devices
